doc.after: The Act of Independence of Lithuania was signed by the Council of Lithuania on February 16 1918 proclaiming the restoration of an independent State of Lithuania governed by democratic principles with Vilnius as its capital The Act was signed by all twenty representatives chaired by Jonas Basanavi ius
